text: Danforth is an unincorporated community in Adair County, in the U.S. state of Missouri. ==History== A post office called Danforth was established in 1885, and remained in operation until 1906. The name most likely is a transfer from Danforth, Illinois. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Adair County, Missouri Category:1885 establishments in Missouri Category:Unincorporated communities in Missouri
title: Danforth, Missouri
